definitions.body: as food: [[עִזִּים]] ([[גְּדִי]])[[גְּדָיֵי ]] kid(s) of she-goats Ge 27:9, Ge 27:16 (J) + 7 t., [[שְׂעִיר עִזִּים]] Ge 37:31 (J) a buck of goats, he-goat, [[שֵׂה עִזִּים]] De 14:4 a (n individual) goat; cf. Le 7:23 (P; fat forbidden); also ´[[חֲלֵב ע]] Pr 27:27 goats’ milk.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[חַטָּאת]], ´[[שְׂעִיר ע]] Ez Eze 43:22, Eze 45:23, Le 4:23 + 3 t. Lv, Nu 7:16 + 19 t. Nu; [[שְׂעִירַת עִזִּים]] a single she-goat Le 4:28, Le 5:6; [[עְפִרֵי זִּים]] 2Ch 29:21 he-goats.
[[עִזִּים]] = goats’ hair, as material 1Sa 19:13, 1Sa 19:16, Ex 25:4 + 6 t. P (Ex 35:26 obj. of [[טָווּ]]!). †
in sim. [[חֲשַׂפֵי עִזִּים]] 1Ki 20:27 (v. [[[חָשִׂיף]]]); ´[[כְּעֵדַר הָע]] Ct So 4:1, So 6:5, of flowing, undulating hair. †
´[[חְפִיר הָע]] Dn Da 8:5, Da 8:8 he-goat in vision.
